headline: McCormick Declares $0.45 Quarterly Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of McCormick & Company, Incorporated (NYSE:MKC) declared a quarterly dividend of $0.45 per share on its common stocks, payable July 21, 2025 to shareholders of record July 7, 2025.
